template<class Matrix, class Vector, class Preconditioner, class Real>
int CG (  const Matrix &  A,
Vector &  x,
const Vector &  b,
const Preconditioner &  M,
int &  max_iter,
Real &  tol
) 
  

00026 {
00027   Real resid;
00028   Vector p, z, q;
00029   Vector alpha(1), beta(1), rho(1), rho_1(1);
00030 
00031   Real normb = norm(b);
00032   Vector r = b - A*x;
00033 
00034   if (normb == 0.0) 
00035     normb = 1;
00036   
00037   if ((resid = norm(r) / normb) <= tol) {
00038     tol = resid;
00039     max_iter = 0;
00040     return 0;
00041   }
00042 
00043   for (int i = 1; i <= max_iter; i++) {
00044     z = M.solve(r);
00045     rho(0) = dot(r, z);
00046     
00047     if (i == 1)
00048       p = z;
00049     else {
00050       beta(0) = rho(0) / rho_1(0);
00051       p = z + beta(0) * p;
00052     }
00053     
00054     q = A*p;
00055     alpha(0) = rho(0) / dot(p, q);
00056     
00057     x += alpha(0) * p;
00058     r -= alpha(0) * q;
00059     
00060     if ((resid = norm(r) / normb) <= tol) {
00061       tol = resid;
00062       max_iter = i;
00063       return 0;     
00064     }
00065 
00066     rho_1(0) = rho(0);
00067   }
00068   
00069   tol = resid;
00070   return 1;
00071 }
